en: Muhammad is the Messenger of Allah;
and those with him are forceful against the disbelievers,
You see them bowing and prostrating [in prayer],
seeking bounty from Allah and [His] pleasure.

ar: سِيمَاهُمْ فِى وُجُوهِهِم مِّنْ أَثَرِ السُّجُودِ
en: Their sign is in their faces from the effect of prostration [i.e., prayer].
That is their description in the Torah.
And their description in the Gospel is as a plant
which produces its offshoots and strengthens them
so they grow firm and stand upon their stalks,
so that He [i.e., Allah] may enrage by them the disbelievers.
Allah has promised those who believe
and do righteous deeds among them
